articles.title: Indonesia urges Myanmar to approve appointment of ASEAN envoy - CNA
articles.description: JAKARTA: Indonesia's foreign minister urged Myanmar on Monday (Aug 2) to approve the appointment of an Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) special envoy and said little progress had been made on a plan to promote talks between Myanmar's rival sides.

articles.title: Philippine Gokongwei Group Exits Australia, New Zealand Snack Foods Business - Forbes
articles.description: Universal Robina Corp. (URC) agreed to sell its remaining 60% stake in Unisnack ANZ to its joint venture partner Intersnack Group, exiting the Australian and New Zealand snack food business to focus on Southeast Asia.
